## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyld">RuntimeDyld</a> invariant checker for verifying that <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyld">RuntimeDyld</a> has correctly applied relocations.

The <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyldchecker">RuntimeDyldChecker</a> class evaluates expressions against an attached <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/runtimedyld">RuntimeDyld</a> instance to verify that relocations have been applied correctly.

The expression language supports basic pointer arithmetic and bit-masking, and has limited disassembler integration for accessing instruction operands and the next PC (program counter) address for each instruction.

The language syntax is:

check = expr &#39;=&#39; expr

expr = binary&#95;expr | sliceable&#95;expr

sliceable&#95;expr = &#39;&#42;&#123;&#39; number &#39;&#125;&#39; load&#95;addr&#95;expr &#91;slice&#93; | &#39;(&#39; expr &#39;)&#39; &#91;slice&#93; | ident&#95;expr &#91;slice&#93; | number &#91;slice&#93;

slice = &#39;&#91;&#39; high-bit-index &#39;:&#39; low-bit-index &#39;&#93;&#39;

load&#95;addr&#95;expr = symbol | &#39;(&#39; symbol &#39;+&#39; number &#39;)&#39; | &#39;(&#39; symbol &#39;-&#39; number &#39;)&#39;

ident&#95;expr = &#39;decode&#95;operand&#39; &#39;(&#39; symbol &#39;,&#39; operand-index &#39;)&#39; | &#39;next&#95;pc&#39; &#39;(&#39; symbol &#39;)&#39; | &#39;stub&#95;addr&#39; &#39;(&#39; stub-container-name &#39;,&#39; symbol &#39;)&#39; | &#39;got&#95;addr&#39; &#39;(&#39; stub-container-name &#39;,&#39; symbol &#39;)&#39; | &#39;section&#95;addr&#39; &#39;(&#39; stub-container-name &#39;,&#39; symbol &#39;)&#39; | symbol

binary&#95;expr = expr &#39;+&#39; expr | expr &#39;-&#39; expr | expr &#39;&amp;&#39; expr | expr &#39;|&#39; expr | expr &#39;&lt;&lt;&#39; expr | expr &#39;&gt;&gt;&#39; expr

Definition at line 80 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/runtimedyldchecker-h">RuntimeDyldChecker.h</a>.

### checkAllRulesInBuffer() {#a0f3ab46a78d6f16381bb41f1cd07a6da}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>bool RuntimeDyldChecker::checkAllRulesInBuffer (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> RulePrefix, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/memorybuffer">MemoryBuffer</a> &#42; MemBuf) const</>}>
Scan the given memory buffer for lines beginning with the string in RulePrefix.

The remainder of the line is passed to the check method to be evaluated as an expression.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/runtimedyldchecker-h/#l00178">178</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/runtimedyldchecker-h">RuntimeDyldChecker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/runtimedyld/runtimedyldchecker-cpp/#l01051">1051</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/runtimedyld/runtimedyldchecker-cpp">RuntimeDyldChecker.cpp</a>.

### getSectionAddr() {#a0bf07d240bbd005ee53b0b6c058763de}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>std::pair&lt; uint64&#95;t, std::string &gt; RuntimeDyldChecker::getSectionAddr (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> FileName, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/stringref">StringRef</a> SectionName, bool LocalAddress)</>}>
Returns the address of the requested section (or an error message in the second element of the pair if the address cannot be found).

if &#39;LocalAddress&#39; is true, this returns the address of the section within the linker&#39;s memory. If &#39;LocalAddress&#39; is false it returns the address within the target process (i.e. the load address).

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/runtimedyldchecker-h/#l00186">186</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/runtimedyldchecker-h">RuntimeDyldChecker.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/runtimedyld/runtimedyldchecker-cpp/#l01057">1057</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/runtimedyld/runtimedyldchecker-cpp">RuntimeDyldChecker.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
